text: avar (sulaiman) mitu nam maranattai vititta potu avar irantu vittar enpatai, avar (cayntirunta) tatiyai arittu vitta nilattin pucci (karaiyanait) tavira veretuvum anta jinkalukku arivikkavillai avar kile vilave"tankal maraivana visayankalai arintirukkak kutumanal (katina ulaippakiya) ilivutarum vetanaiyil tankal tari pattintirukka ventiyatillai" enru jinkalukku telivaka terintatu
